original_text: He made the basin of bronze and its stand of bronze, from the mirrors of the ministering women who ministered in the entrance of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 그가 놋으로 물두멍을 만들고 그 받침도 놋으로 하였으니 곧 회막 문에서 수종드는 여인들의 거울로 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: He made the basin of bronze
from the mirrors of the ministering women
who ministered in the entrance of the tent of meeting
